title: Software Engineer Lead, Web and Chatbot Development
achievements: I have successfully deployed 100+ advanced features into production, managing updates and ensuring seamless integration for scalable, high-performing solutions. I also lead the migration of over 50,000 customers in the DRC to a bilingual conversational platform. By integrating Large Language Models (LLMs), I am enhancing chatbot interactions with natural conversational experiences. Mentoring and guiding diverse engineering teams, I foster collaboration and innovation to deliver impactful solutions that align with business goals and elevate user experiences.

title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: I played a key role in the design, development, and launch of a scalable, responsive banking platform, significantly improving customer experience and satisfaction in the Democratic Republic of Congo. I led the expansion of the platform to serve over 1 million customers across six countries through successful localization and internationalization efforts. Collaborating closely with UI/UX designers, I ensured a consistent user experience that aligned with technical requirements. By providing technical support, I achieved onboarding and transaction success rates exceeding 90%, while working with backend developers to optimize services and APIs for enhanced performance.

title: Software Engineer, Frontend
achievements: I develop customer-facing features and products, optimizing applications for speed and scalability. I collaborate with the design team to create responsive designs and work with the API team to integrate endpoints with frontend apps. I ensure features meet requirements by working closely with the testing team to resolve bugs and issues. I analyze project requirements, arrange programming sequences, and conduct code reviews for team members. Additionally, I present and train stakeholders and users on new products and features.

title: ICT Supervisor
achievements: I delivered training programs for content supervisors and enumerators, equipping them with the skills to effectively conduct the census. I provided technical support and troubleshooting for devices in Dagoretti sub-county, ensuring smooth operations with minimal downtime. I managed logistical support for a team of 174, ensuring timely distribution of materials such as tablets and power banks. By developing and implementing strategies, I successfully enumerated over 98% of the population in my area, ensuring comprehensive and accurate data collection. I also compiled and distributed daily progress reports, while ensuring data integrity through rigorous quality assurance processes.

title: Frontend Software Engineer
achievements: I collaborated with the development team to enhance application usability, navigation, and design, improving user experience and efficiency. I led performance optimization efforts, boosting website speed and responsiveness by over 40% through techniques like caching, lazy loading, and script minification. I executed SEO strategies, securing consistent top 5 rankings for the site. I also designed and oversaw the development of mobile apps for Android and iOS, ensuring they met user needs. Additionally, I designed and curated content for the Syfe car-hire service blog and developed an early warning system for NGOs during the Covid-19 pandemic.
